name: playwright-cucumber-steps
description: Cucumber steps (step definitions) written with Playwright for end-to-end (e2e) tests

scripts.install:test-dependencies-old: PLAYWRIGHT_SKIP_BROWSER_DOWNLOAD=true npm install && npx playwright install firefox
scripts.test2: PO_FOLDER_PATH='tests/page-objects' node ./node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js --require tests/setup/hooks.js --require index.js tests/features/**/*.feature -f json:logs/cucumber_report.json --publish-quiet
scripts.patch: npm version patch -m "Bump up package version to %s" && git push && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.minor: npm version minor -m "Bump up package version to %s" && git push && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.major: npm version major -m "Bump up package version to %s" && git push && git push origin --tags && npm publish

author: Dmytro Shpakovskyi
